actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to phase out the operation, construction, and export of civilian nuclear-fission power-plants by January, 1980.

summary.text: Nuclear Power Moratorium Act - Directs the Atomic Energy Commission to enforce an immediate moratorium on the operation, construction, and export of civilian nuclear-fission powerplants. Provides that the operation of such plants shall be terminated no later than January, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to phase out the operation, construction, and export of civilian nuclear-fission power-plants by January, 1980.
